Penance {5}{R}{R} [i](If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.)[/i]
Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control get +[b][1][/b]/+0 until end of turn.
